description:
When I run euca-describe-regions, I get following error

AttributeError??: 'NoneType??' object has no attribute 'keys'
title: DescribeRegions is not working

comments.content:
When I run euca-describe-regions, I get following error

AttributeError??: 'NoneType??' object has no attribute 'keys'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tpatil

comments.content: This patch looks good, making a branch for proposal
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
euca-describe-regions is still failing.

After checking the source code ec2_prefix flag from flags.py is modified to ec2_scheme.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tpatil

comments.content:
this also breaks the openstack dashboard ...

comments.content: Ok ... i think i've fixed this. will generate patch in just a minute.

comments.content: should be as simple as s/ec2_prefix/ec2_scheme
